casebody.data:
In the Matter of William T. WESTMORELAND; Mary B. Westmoreland, Debtors, William T. Westmoreland; Mary B. Westmoreland, Appellants, v. United States Trustee; Lucy G. Sikes, Appellees. No. 04-30400.

(Summary Calendar).

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Decided Oct. 14, 2004. Leo A. Miller, Jr., Monroe, LA, for Appellant. *423Frances Hewitt Strange, Shreveport, LA, Lucy G. Sikes, Alexandria, LA, for Appellee. Before GARZA, DeMOSS, and CLEMENT, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM: *

We affirm the district court’s judgment essentially for the reasons given in its Opinion of January 26, 2004.

AFFIRMED.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
